title: addons stopped working after last weeks update
content: Roboform doesn't show up in the toolbar and it doesn't pop up to suggest passwords. Video download helper doesn't show up in toolbar. This all started after the latest update. Thanks Bob
creator: bob425

title: use my own photo as firefox wallpaper
content: How can I use my own photo as wallpaper for Firefox?

title: sometimes get white menu bar lately
content:
More recently, for the past few months maybe, I sometimes get a white menubar when Firefox is in the forefront. Clicking on it will restore the menubar.

Here's a pic

I am using the latest Mac OS, 15.4.1, and it happened with the previous version too.

Thanks for any help.
creator: lipwak
